Pokesearch
By Adory Vo

Source: https://github.com/AdoryVo/pokesearch
Releases: https://github.com/AdoryVo/pokesearch/releases

Contents
--------
1. Introduction
2. Acknowledgements

Introduction
------------
A command line tool for searching Pokemon information. Built as 
a practice project for learning Go - a webpage or social platform bot
would be better suited for this purpose.

Acknowledgements
----------------
Inspired by a Soul Link Nuzlocke with Austin & Stephen involving many Googlings.
